channel.title: Character models stuck together
channel.description:
In the last map in Office Complex my two guards got stuck together. It started after I got through the cooler room, and went back to get the two plus one scientist. I managed to separate them though. I just told one of them to wait and had the other one follow me. After I got some space between them, I just told the first one to follow again. And then we all had a very productive day.
See image attached for my siamese Barneys
map : bm_c1a2c at: 2 x, 611 y, 280 z
setpos 18.125690 619.362183 280.031250;setang 1.809355 162.852432 0.000000 ![2012-09-15_00007.jpg|690x500](upload://nxwVGO4JoGi0gqu3sgaPYEzWCDH.jpeg)
